original_text: Moses had sent his wife, Zipporah, back to her home. He also sent his two sons with her. Jethro took care of them.
korean_text: 모세의 장인 이드로가 모세가 돌려 보냈던 그의 아내 십보라와

sentences.original_text: Moses had sent his wife, Zipporah, back to her home.
sentences.korean_translation: 모세는 그의 아내 시불라를 그녀의 집으로 돌려보냈습니다.

sentences.original_text: He also sent his two sons with her.
sentences.korean_translation: 그는 그녀와 함께 그의 두 아들도 보냈습니다.
